template.name: Android Things Peripheral Activity
template.description: Creates a new activity for Android Things with peripherals

parameter.name: Activity Name
parameter.help: The name of the activity class to create

parameter.name: Button
parameter.help: If true, dependencies and corresponding code to support buttons will be generated.

parameter.name: Capacitive touch buttons (cap12xx)
parameter.help: If true, dependencies and corresponding code to support capacitive touch buttons will be generated.

parameter.name: OLED display (ssd1306)
parameter.help: If true, dependencies and corresponding code to support an OLED display will be generated.

parameter.name: Alphanumeric segment display (ht16k33)
parameter.help: If true, dependencies and corresponding code to support an alphanumeric display will be generated.

parameter.name: Numeric segment display (tm11637)
parameter.help: If true, dependencies and corresponding code to support a numeric display will be generated.

parameter.name: LED strip (apa102)
parameter.help: If true, dependencies and corresponding code to support an LED strip will be generated.

parameter.name: Accelerometer (mma7660fc)
parameter.help: If true, dependencies and corresponding code to support an accelerometer will be generated.

parameter.name: Accelerometer Service Name
parameter.help: The name of the service class to create for the accelerometer

parameter.name: GPS
parameter.help: If true, dependencies and corresponding code to support a GPS will be generated.

parameter.name: GPS Service Name
parameter.help: The name of the service class for the GPS

parameter.name: Temperature and pressure sensor (bmx280)
parameter.help: If true, dependencies and corresponding code to support a temperature and pressure sensor will be generated.

parameter.name: Temperature and pressure Service Name
parameter.help: The name of the service class for the temperature and pressure sensor

parameter.name: PWM servo
parameter.help: If true, dependencies and corresponding code to support a servo will be generated.

parameter.name: PWM speaker/buzzer
parameter.help: If true, dependencies and corresponding code to support a speaker/buzzer will be generated.

parameter.name: Android Things launcher Activity
parameter.help: If true, the activity will have an IOT_LAUNCHER intent filter, making it the one activity launched when the Android Things device initiates. Only one activity on the device can have this intent filter.
